results.title: Is neurally mediated hypotension an unrecognised cause of chronic fatigue?
results.text_hl: Four had prompt improvement in their @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue_Syndrome_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015673 @@@chronic fatigue@@@ when treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Disopyramide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004206 @@@disopyramide@@@.

citations.NLM: Rowe PC, Bou-Holaigah I, Kan JS, Calkins H. Is neurally mediated hypotension an unrecognised cause of chronic fatigue? Lancet. 1995 Mar 11;345(8950):623-4. PMID: 7898182
